article_title: Suspect in 2013 Kenyan mall attack killed in U.S. drone strike
article_text: March 14, 2015, 12:10 AM |A U.S. drone missile strike in Somalia killed the man suspected of planning the deadly 2013 attack on a shopping mall in Kenya. The drone strike came as Adan Garaar, described as a senior member of the Al-Shabaab Islamic rebel group, was traveling by car through southern Somalia on Thursday. Anthony Mason has more details on the strike.
